title: Arduino Uno
description: The Arduino UNO is the best board to get started with electronics and coding. If this is your first experience tinkering with the platform, the UNO is the most robust board you can start playing with. The UNO is the most used and documented board of the whole Arduino family.

title: 25GA-370-24V-130 RPM DC Gear Motor
description: Introducing the versatile and reliable 25GA-370-24V-130 RPM DC Gear Motor, engineered for robotics enthusiasts and automation projects of all kinds. This motor offers exceptional performance and comes in various configurations to suit your specific design needs. Featuring a compact cylindrical shape with a 25mm diameter and a 4mm shaft, this motor is equipped with 2 terminal connectors for easy installation. Its design focuses on generating high torque while consuming minimal current, making it an ideal choice for a wide range of applications.

title: TowerPro SG 90 Micro Servo Motor
description: A servomotor is a closed-loop servomechanism that uses position feedback (either linear or rotational position) to control its motion and final position. The input to its control is a signal (either analog or digital) representing the desired position of the output shaft.
